title: Doctors Handwriting
content: I have a friend who asked for this style of handwriting font. Any Ideas?
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content: Basically a script that you can't read? :-D

Sounds like fake Rx's would be easier to generate than ever... :-)

--Michael.

------------------------------------------------------

…a completely illegible font. sounds like fun ; \>

------  
nc

Let's see... Here are a few suggestions:  
 [Dad's Recipe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211541/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/dads.html)  
 [Rats](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211541/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FBT0200012)  
 [Sudestada](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211541/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000083)  
 [Brisa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211541/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000027)  
 [Cholo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211541/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lab/lab_cholo.htm)

--Michael.
